text: John Bowman Duncan (December 7, 1923 - February 8, 2016) was an American actor. He was known for his roles in The East Side Kids, The Bowery Boys and the 1949 serial Batman and Robin as Dick Grayson/Robin, the Boy Wonder. He was also in Bedtime for Bonzo and in Plan 9 from Outer Space He was also one of the "Dead End Kids". They were a group of young actors from New York who were in a Broadway play, Dead End, in 1935. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Website for Johnny Duncan Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
